mapper.sql: id, quest_code, quest_name, quest_level, resolving_by_team_id,resolving_by_team_name, quest_description, state
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quest (quest_code, quest_name, quest_level, resolving_by_team_id, resolving_by_team_name, quest_description, state) VALUES (#{questCode}, #{questName}, #{questLevel}, #{resolvingByTeamId}, #{resolvingByTeamName}, #{questDescription}, #{state})
mapper.update: UPDATE quest SET quest_code = #{questCode}, quest_name = #{questName}, quest_level = #{questLevel}, resolving_by_team_id = #{resolvingByTeamId}, resolving_by_team_name = #{resolvingByTeamName}, quest_description = #{questDescription}, state = #{state} WHERE id = #{id}
